A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars fans will hate this\,  it completely destroys all lore\, history and the soul of the franchise.

Non fans will also hate this because the writing is horrible\, scenes are cringe worthy\, the humour is beyond bad\, and the plot has way to many idiotic holes.

Nothing interesting\, exciting\, groundbreaking\, just a massive dud. This director will single handedly ruin was was once great if they let him continue. JJ Abrams at least kept the heart going\, Rian Johnson is basically a loser.
